author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Shining as bright as brilliant stars and as deep as the blackness between them, Christopher Ruocchio’s Demon in White is one of—if not the—best sci-fi I’ve ever read. Part political scheming, part military sci-fi, all electrifying work, Demon in White subverts expectations, asks challenging questions, and leaves jaws dropped.  “One has rank because one deserves […]

The post REVIEW: Demon in White by Christopher Ruocchio appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Demon in White by Christopher Ruocchio
